testcase.classname: Functionality of "search" box on the homepage
testcase.name: Verify that if a user writes any product name in the search section, - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given The user navigate to novoDaily website................................passed And accept the cookie.......................................................passed When click on search box and type any "NovoDailies".........................passed Then wait for the homepage to load for 5 seconds............................passed And verify that the "99,00", "1", logo of product are displayed.............passed And verify that "NovoDailies" contains any of the words written in the search box.passed Then close the browser......................................................passed
